      • addResourcesToPlayer

        public void addResourcesToPlayer(ResourceList resList,
                                 int playerIndex)
        Adds the specified amount of resources to a given player.
        Parameters:
        resList - A ResourceList with the positive amounts going to be added to the player.
        playerIndex - The index of the player who will get the resources.

      • takeResourcesFromPlayer

        public void takeResourcesFromPlayer(ResourceList resList,
                                    int playerIndex)
                             throws NotEnoughResourcesException
        Takes the specified amount of resources from a given player.
        Parameters:
        resList - A ResourceList with the positive amounts needed to be taken from the player.
        playerIndex - The index of the player who will lose the resources.
        Throws:
        NotEnoughResourcesException

        Returns:
